snippet.title: InMomentum Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Digital Arrow's surreal 3D puzzle/racing game InMomentum, powered by Epic Game Inc.'s cutting edge Unreal Engine 3 is available on Steam starting today:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/110400/

InMomentum is a minimalistic / sci-fi platform racing game that challenges the players to think in both horizontal and vertical perspectives while racing each other or against the clock in a puzzle-like environment.

Community Forums: http://www.digital-arrow.com/forum
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/InMomentum/200226006663733
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/momentum
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/DigitalArrow

http://www.digital-arrow.com

Epic, Epic Games, Unreal, Unreal Development Kit, UDK, Unreal Engine and UE3 are trademarks or registered trademarks of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
